channel.title: The Carpe $DIEM Blog - News
channel.description: Venice AI news curated by a privacy-minded human.

item.title: OpenAI had a data breach
item.description: OpenAI disclosed that one of its telemetry providers, Mixpanel, suffered a security breach leaking limited customer-identifiable analytics data. The incident underlines why privacy-focused services like Venice avoid such telemetry, so these kinds of leaks can't happen by design.

item.title: VVV vs DIEM infographics (with Nano Banana Pro)
item.description: Two community-made infographics generated with Google's Nano Banana Pro explain how VVV enables tokenized intelligence with DIEM, showing visually how the two interact. Check the images on the news page for Version 1 and Version 2.

item.title: Venice banned by UK government in schools
item.description: Venice is banned by the UK government in schools, a disappointing decision given the educational system should be promoting truth and knowledge.
